relatedBlades.title: The Microsoft dilemma: Reducing risk from essential tools
relatedBlades.copy: With its massive scale of adoption, Microsoft is the number one most impersonated brand in the world. For organizations that rely heavily on Microsoft security, enforcing accountability has become a challenge.
